snippet: Sour, grassy and bright, this herb, melted into a pan full of seared scallops, slaps you out of your wintry potato doldrums.
abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column features recipe for scallops with sorrel butter.
lead_paragraph: Sour, grassy and bright, this herb, melted into a pan full of seared scallops, slaps you out of your wintry potato doldrums.

headline.main: Taking Advantage of Sorrel’s Brief Life
